description:
When criminal charges turn individuals' lives upside down, the criminal defense law office of Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC, in Rockville, Maryland, calls upon its talent, resources and experience to set things right. We routinely take on some of the most complex misdemeanor and felony cases that grace the court system, and we win. We attribute our extensive track record of success to several factors, one of the biggest of which is that we are selective about which cases we take on. If, following the free initial consultation, we agree to work with a client and they with us, we devote our full time and attention to the case and operate with a singular goal in mind: to achieve the best possible outcome.

When our law office takes on a case, it does so with the conviction that the only outcome is a positive outcome. This confidence translates to aggressive advocacy both in and out of the courtroom and, more often than not, favorable results. We take on cases both large and small and skillfully represent clients in matters pertaining to the following:

  • DUI/DWI
  • Sex offenses
  • Sexual abuse
  • Drug violations
  • White collar crimes
  • Personal injury
  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Domestic violence and neglect
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Medical malpractice
  • Workers' compensation
The attorneys of Rowe, Weinstein & Sohn, PLLC, collectively embody the hard-hitting representation, skill and commitment that make our law office the first one Rockville residents call when a legal issue threatens their emotional health, financial well-being and livelihoods. We place considerable value on open communication, transparency and accessibility. To emphasize this, we encourage contact via in-person and virtual appointments, and gladly accept credit cards.
